item.title: [Python] I tried HR Tech to develop an expert search engine by machine learning the in-house meeting information
item.description: ## TL; DR We will create an expert search engine by utilizing the dark data that sleeps inside the company and the data related to meetings. This guy This will help you find the in-house expert and the contact path to that expert. 1. Background. .. .. 1.1 What is work style reform? It is often said that Jitahara has work style reform. Jitahara: Forcing employees to leave the company, such as “Do not work overtime” and “Return on time” without specific measures to reduce overtime hours
